articles.title: COVID-19 cases in Europe up again after 10 weeks of decline: WHO Europe - CNA
articles.description: COPENHAGEN: The World Health Organization (WHO) on Thursday (Jul 1) said COVID-19 cases were on the rise again in Europe after two months of decline and warned a new wave would come "unless we remain disciplined".

articles.title: After India’s diplomatic push, Switzerland and 9 EU nations add SII’s Covishield in Green Passport List - Times Now
